entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is the gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is being spoken to by Harry.

entities.name: aragog
entities.description: Aragog is a giant spider that has died and is being mourned by Hagrid and Harry.

entities.name: professor slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is a Hogwarts professor who meets Harry coming down to the scene of Aragog's death.

relationships.description: Harry is mourning the death of Aragog.
Hagrid is mourning the death of Aragog.
Professor Slughorn wants to pay his last respects to Aragog.
Hagrid is surprised and touched by Professor Slughorn's actions.
